class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Pre-requisite: ENGCW 370RW, Intermediate Fiction (with a final grade of A- or A)


Students must attend the first class to be enrolled in this workshop.


Application required. Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) and application form will be available on the Creative Writing Program website in LATE MARCH: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html. Please email nora.lewis@emory.edu if you have any questions.


Writing sample: 5-10 pages of fiction (double-spaced)
course_description: Spring semester. Admittance by assessment of readiness for advanced work by intermediate level instructor in genre. Intensive workshop in the writing of fiction for advanced students. May be repeated for a maximum of eight hours credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 3614, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: T. Jones, Status: Open
